pages.text: $(thing)Galagas$() roam the $(thing)Swamp Zones$() of the $(thing)Misty World$().These large creatures are aggressive, and have a $(thing)Poisonous$() bite, damaging and slowing their prey.$(br2)Killing a $(thing)Galaga$() grants 1 $(thing)Cutting$() experience.$(br2)They can be tamed and bred using any $(item)Meat$(), requiring $(thing)Taming level 5$(). Once tamed, they can be $(item)Saddled$().

pages.name: Galaga
pages.drop1: mist:meat_food:11{display: {Lore: ["Drops: 0-1", "Affected by Looting", "Affected by Cutting Skill", "Cooks if killed while on Fire"]}}
pages.drop2: minecraft:bone{display: {Lore: ["Drops: 0-3", "Affected by Looting", "Affected by Cutting Skill"]}}
